tags.html:
var gcloud = require('gcloud');

var search = gcloud.search({
projectId: 'grape-spaceship-123'
});

var index = search.index('records');

description.full: Create an Index object to interact with a Google Cloud Search index.
description.summary: Create an Index object to interact with a Google Cloud Search index.

tags.string:
{object|module:search/document} documentObj - A properly-formed
    Document object as outlined in the
    [official docs](https://goo.gl/AYhSgI).
tags.name: documentObj
tags.description:
• A properly-formed Document object as outlined in the
    official docs.

tags.string: {?error} callback.err - An error returned while making this request
tags.name: callback.err
tags.description: • An error returned while making this request

tags.html:
//-
// A document can be built using the {module:search/document} object.
//-
var newDocument = index.document('new-document-id');
newDocument.addField('person').addTextValue('Stephen');

index.createDocument(newDocument, function(err, document, apiResponse) {});

//-
// A document can also be created from a properly-formed object as outlined
// in the official docs.
//
// This will create the same resulting document object as the example above.
//-
var newDocument = {
docId: 'new-document-id',
fields: {
person: {
values: [
{
stringFormat: 'TEXT',
stringValue: 'Stephen'
}
]
}
}
};

index.createDocument(newDocument, function(err, document, apiResponse) {});

//-
// Specifying an ID for your new document isn't required. In both of the
// scenarios above, simply don't specify 'new-document-id' and one will be
// generated for you.
//-

tags.string: {string} id - The id of the document.
tags.name: id

tags.string:
{boolean} options.autoPaginate - Have pagination handled
    automatically. Default: true.
tags.name: options.autoPaginate

tags.string:
{string} query.pageSize - The maximum number of documents to return
    per page. If not specified, 100 documents are returned per page.
tags.name: query.pageSize
tags.description: • The maximum number of documents to return per page. If not specified, 100 documents are returned per page.

tags.string:
{string} query.pageToken - A previously-returned page token
    representing part of the larger set of results to view.
tags.name: query.pageToken
tags.description: • A previously-returned page token representing part of the larger set of results to view.

tags.string:
{string} query.view - One of `INDEX_VIEW_UNSPECIFIED`, `ID_ONLY`, or
    `FULL`. See [this table](https://goo.gl/sY6Lpt) for more details.
tags.name: query.view
tags.description: • One of INDEX_VIEW_UNSPECIFIED, ID_ONLY, or FULL. See this table for more details.

tags.string: {?error} callback.err - An error returned while making this request
tags.name: callback.err
tags.description: • An error returned while making this request

tags.string:
{?object} callback.nextQuery - If present, query with this object to
    check for more results.
tags.name: callback.nextQuery
tags.description: • If present, query with this object to check for more results.

tags.html:
index.getDocuments(function(err, documents) {
if (!err) {
// documents is an array of Document objects.
}
});

//-
// To control how many API requests are made and page through the results
// manually, set autoPaginate to false.
//-
function onApiResponse(err, documents, nextQuery, apiResponse) {
if (err) {
console.error(err);
return;
}

// documents is an array of Document objects.

if (nextQuery) {
index.getDocuments(nextQuery, onApiResponse);
}
}

index.getDocuments({
autoPaginate: false
}, onApiResponse);

//-
// Get the documents as a readable object stream.
//-
index.getDocuments()
.on('error', console.error)
.on('data', function(document) {
// document is a Document object.
})
.on('end', function() {
// All documents retrieved.
});

//-
// If you anticipate many results, you can end a stream early to prevent
// unnecessary processing and API requests.
//-
index.getDocuments()
.on('data', function(document) {
this.end();
});

description.full: Get {module:search/document} objects for all of the documents in this index.
description.summary: Get {module:search/document} objects for all of the documents in this index.

tags.string: {error} If a query string or object isn't provided.
tags.description: If a query string or object isn't provided.

tags.string: {string|object} query - A query object or simply a string query.
tags.name: query
tags.description: • A query object or simply a string query.

tags.string:
{boolean} query.autoPaginate - Have pagination handled automatically.
    Default: true.
tags.name: query.autoPaginate

tags.string:
{string} query.pageSize - The maximum number of documents to return
    per page. If not specified, 100 documents are returned per page.
tags.name: query.pageSize
tags.description: • The maximum number of documents to return per page. If not specified, 100 documents are returned per page.

tags.string:
{string} query.pageToken - A previously-returned page token
    representing part of the larger set of results to view.
tags.name: query.pageToken
tags.description: • A previously-returned page token representing part of the larger set of results to view.

tags.string:
{string} query.query = A query string using the syntax described by
    the [official docs](https://goo.gl/2SYl3S).
tags.name: query.query
tags.description: = A query string using the syntax described by the official docs.

tags.string: {?error} callback.err - An error returned while making this request
tags.name: callback.err
tags.description: • An error returned while making this request

tags.string:
{?object} callback.nextQuery - If present, query with this object to
    check for more results.
tags.name: callback.nextQuery
tags.description: • If present, query with this object to check for more results.

tags.html:
var query = 'person:stephen';

index.search(query, function(err, documents) {
if (!err) {
// documents is an array of Document objects.
}
});

//-
// To control how many API requests are made and page through the results
// manually, set autoPaginate to false.
//-
function onApiResponse(err, documents, nextQuery, apiResponse) {
if (err) {
console.error(err);
return;
}

// documents is an array of Document objects.

if (nextQuery) {
index.search(nextQuery, onApiResponse);
}
}

index.search({
autoPaginate: false,
query: query
}, onApiResponse);

//-
// Get the documents that match your query as a readable object stream.
//-
index.search(query)
.on('error', console.error)
.on('data', function(document) {
// document is a Document object.
})
.on('end', function() {
// All search results retrieved.
});

description.full:
Run a query against the documents in this index.

For a full list of supported query parameters, see the
JSON API documentation.
description.summary: Run a query against the documents in this index.
description.body:
For a full list of supported query parameters, see the
JSON API documentation.

tags.string: {number=} documentObj.rank - The rank of the document.
tags.name: documentObj.rank

tags.html:
var documentObject = {
docId: 'new-document-id',
fields: {
person: {
values: [
{
stringFormat: 'TEXT',
stringValue: 'Stephen'
}
]
}
}
};

var document = index.documentFromObject_(documentObject);
// document is a {module:search/document} object.

description.full:
Make a new request object from the provided arguments and wrap the callback
to intercept non-successful responses.
description.summary:
Make a new request object from the provided arguments and wrap the callback
to intercept non-successful responses.

description.full:
Developer Documentation

{module:search/index#getDocuments} and {module:search/index#search} can be
used with either a callback or as a readable object stream. streamRouter is
used to add this dual behavior to these methods.
description.body:
{module:search/index#getDocuments} and {module:search/index#search} can be
used with either a callback or as a readable object stream. streamRouter is
used to add this dual behavior to these methods.
